name: David Ejones
description:
I’m 49, From Florida Orange Park area),
I have a Son, I don’t like to take credit for the special things that I do because it comes from my heart, compassionate, best friend to have around, love children, love animals love working with special needs children in church, fun, witty, trusting, honest, faithful, a Catholic (Christian), one that can dress up or down,love to volunteer, great organizer, love to barbecue, i love to kiss. I have not been married so no baggage to speak of. I am not here to find a person to take care of me nor do I expect someone to take care of me. Relationships are 50/50.
